description: This file defines the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter app, implementing a discovery-style home page with header, search bar, tabbed sections, and carousel-based content filtering.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget class representing the home screen with discovery features.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: State class for HomeScreen, managing UI state and content.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes controllers and sets up the state of the widget.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of controllers when the widget is removed from the widget tree.

methods.name: _goSearch
methods.description: Handles search submission, navigating to the listing route.

methods.name: _filterCategory
methods.description: Filters the list of books based on the selected category.

methods.name: _trending
methods.description: Generates a list of trending books, shuffled deterministically.

methods.name: _forYou
methods.description: Creates a personalized list of books by interleaving categories.

methods.name: _topRated
methods.description: Provides a list of top-rated books sorted descending by rating.

methods.name: _heroHeader
methods.description: Builds the hero header with gradient background and branding text.

methods.name: _tabContent
methods.description: Builds the content for each tab, including category chips and carousel.

methods.name: _openProduct
methods.description: Navigates to the product screen for a specific book.
